Tag.description: A label for tagging Environment resource

Key.description: A string used to identify this tag

Value.description: A string containing the value for the tag

ApiGatewayProxy.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:refactor-spaces:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\w{12}:[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_/]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

ApiGatewayId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 10  

Maximum Length: 10  

Pattern: ^[a-z0-9]{10}$  

Update requires: No interruption

VpcLinkId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 10  

Maximum Length: 10  

Pattern: ^[a-z0-9]{10}$  

Update requires: No interruption

NlbArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:elasticloadbalancing:[a-zA-Z0-9\\-]+:\\w{12}:[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\\-_\/]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

NlbName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 32  

Pattern: ^(?!internal-)[a-zA-Z0-9]+[a-zA-Z0-9-_ ]+.*[^-]$  

Update requires: No interruption

ApplicationIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 14  

Maximum Length: 14  

Pattern: ^app-([0-9A-Za-z]{10}$)  

Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 14  

Maximum Length: 14  

Pattern: ^env-([0-9A-Za-z]{10}$)  

Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 3  

Maximum Length: 63  

Pattern: ^(?!app-)[a-zA-Z0-9]+[a-zA-Z0-9-_ ]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

ProxyType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

VpcId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 12  

Maximum Length: 21  

Pattern: ^vpc-[-a-f0-9]{8}([-a-f0-9]{9})?$  

Update requires: No interruption

StageName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: ^[-a-zA-Z0-9_]*$  

Update requires: No interruption

ProxyUrl.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: ^http://[-a-zA-Z0-9+\x38@#/%?=~_|!:,.;]*[-a-zA-Z0-9+\x38@#/%=~_|]$  

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: Metadata that you can assign to help organize the frameworks that you create. Each tag is a key-value pair.
